ngoList.title: RELIEF ANIMALS WELFARE FOUNDATION
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Since the establishment of our foundation in 2019, we have helped around 700 animals till now. This includes dogs, cows, rabbits, squirrels to delicate aerial animals such as the bird Kite. In the period of lockdown, we provided food to over 300 animals on a daily basis. Apart from serving these beings, we helped the migrants also. We made sure to distribute packed meals and snacks to the people passing through the city of Kanpur.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Since the establishment of Relief Animals Welfare Foundation in 2019, a large proportion of the expenses of the organisation has been funded by us personally. From the daily expenses of petrol, injections, bandages to the cost of bigger operations, we have been paying ourselves largely. We plan to develop our own shelter facility where we would be able to house the animals with severe injuries and those handicapped for life.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The NGO is working in Uttar Pradesh. Since its inception the samiti has been actively engaged in various social work related to educational and financial upliftment of women. The samiti maintains the women empowerment is possible only through educational and financial upliftment of women. Awarness Programmes for Environment & Forest. Vocational Training to women 1.Readymade Garments 2. Chikan work 3. Zari Zardozi work, 4. Fruit & Vegetable Preservation 5. Computer training. Programmes for National Integration and Harmony. Family Welfare Programmes. Programme for saving the environment from further degradation and tree plantation etc. Methods of modern and advanced agriculture by using improved quality of seeds, manure etc. Women welfare programme like Children Education and adult literacy for women. The samiti provides clothes, books etc. to the students. Programmes like provision of potable water, handicapped welfare, welfare of old and infirm people, consumer protection, formation of self help groups, rural development etc. are also taken up by the samiti.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Before getting registered as a society under Society Registration Act 21,1860 Saajhi Duniya worked as an informal group of concerned citizens on the issues of gender equality and composite culture to strengthen the constitutional values of equality, responsible citizenship and quality education including joyful learning. This group comprised eminent educationists, theater artists, literary persons and youth. In June 2004 this group got registered as a society.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: In the recent past there has been increased consensus on the need for gender sensitization. Accordingly efforts have been made to address gender through school curriculum, special training and social media. Majority of these attempts were targeted towards women and under the broader genre of women empowerment. However, Effective path ways and methodologies are yet to emerge and materialize that are aimed at general public and especially the masculine gender.

In the context of increasing gender based violence in the state, UNICEF Lucknow office has initiated a partnership with Saajhi Duniya to create models of engaging boys and men in the efforts to curb gendered violence.

We are making extensive Campaign and awareness programme at the grass root level in the following key areas:- 1-Fostering the development of formal as well as informal Vocation based education. 2-Securing training and financial assistance for women and help groups. 3-Ensuring better access to healthcare facilities and promoting the adoption of modern healthcare and hygiene related practices. 4-Women and child nutrition awareness programme. 5-Improving financial inclusion indicators.
